subject: Frauds and Swindling
Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: One of former N.B.A. referee Tim Donaghy’s co-conspirators admitted Wednesday to paying for picks and intentionally defrauding the league.
snippet: One of former N.B.A. referee Tim Donaghy’s co-conspirators admitted Wednesday to paying for picks and intentionally defrauding the league.
